Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to the value of a material property. "Smooth surfaces" is a description of a material property, but it is not a specific value. "Equivalently measured" is a description of how the measurement was taken and not a material property value. "Blend films" and "phase separation" are not material property values, but rather descriptions of the materials being discussed.
